title: Decreasing LRATC illustrates economies of scale

content.question: Economies of scale can be illustrated by

choices.label: an increasing short-run marginal cost curve as a firm produces more output
a decreasing short-run average total cost curve as a firm produces more output
a downward-sloping long-run supply curve for an industry
a decreasing long-run average total cost curve as a firm produces more output
an increasing long-run average total cost curve as a firm produces more output

content.answer: a decreasing long-run average total cost curve as a firm produces more output
